verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Oh, what joy his love affords when we meet in one accord,
And we lift our hearts in praise unto the Lord;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
There's no place I'd rather be
than with the ones who've been set free,
I'm so glad
I'm in God's great big family

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
It can be just anywhere two or three are gathered there,
that the spirit of the Lord will be there, too;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
there's no fellowship so sweet, there's no thrill that can compete
with the thrill I feel whenever God's children meet.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
On that great reunion day when our Lord says, "come away,"
and the saints from ev'ry land sweep through the gates;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Joining loved ones 'round the throne, at last we'll all be gathered home,
that will be the greatest thrill we've ever known.
